detailed_findings.description: Rate limiting not triggered after 50 rapid requests
detailed_findings.steps_to_reproduce:
1. Send 50 rapid GET requests to /search
2. Check for 429 responses
detailed_findings.expected_output: Some requests should return 429 Too Many Requests

detailed_findings.description: Rate limiting not triggered after 50 rapid requests
detailed_findings.steps_to_reproduce:
1. Send 50 rapid GET requests to /eligibility/check
2. Check for 429 responses

detailed_findings.description: CORS configured to allow all origins (*)
detailed_findings.steps_to_reproduce:
1. Send request with Origin: https://malicious-site.com
2. Check Access-Control-Allow-Origin header

testing_methodology.authentication_tests: JWT validation, bypass attempts, authorization checks
testing_methodology.security_tests: SQL injection, XSS, CORS, sensitive data exposure
testing_methodology.input_validation: Size limits, null values, special characters, boundary cases
testing_methodology.business_logic: Data consistency, eligibility calculations, amount validations
testing_methodology.api_testing: Response formats, error handling, rate limiting
